title: Ever wondered about the role of Evolution vs. Choice in our romantic lives?
description: Let's dive into a woman's unconventional journey on dating and explore the concept of hypergamy. Is a man's purpose just to procreate abundantly? Stay tuned for an intriguing perspective. #Hypergamy #DatingEvolution #UnconventionalChoices #short
caption: false

channel_info.title: Robbie Kramer
channel_info.description:
I'm Robbie Kramer 🎙Host of The Inner Confidence Podcast & Founder of Inner Confidence, Inc.

I lived an exhilarating single life filled with adventures and lessons, and ultimately achieved what I had always aspired to – finding an amazing, feminine, and loving wife. 

I believe my experiences provide a rare balance of wild freedom and committed love, equipping me with the insights to help you navigate the complexities of dating and relationships in today's world. Let me guide you to embrace your desires, improve your social prowess, and ultimately attract the partner who aligns with your highest aspirations.

You won’t find any fluffy, new-age, or cringy stuff here, just tested, proven and actionable advice that yields results.

Apply to join our exclusive Inner Confidence Community of ambitious men who are actively working together to achieve their goals faster   ► https://innerconfidence.com/community

You can email me at robbie@innerconfidence.com with any questions or comments.

transcription: {"text": "Okay, in theory, just from, like, an evolutionary, biological place, men are supposed to just f*** everything and spread their seed as much as humanly possible and procreate as much as possible. That's like what the DNA wants us to do. Yes, that's what the DNA is wanting you to do. And women are trying to find, like, the most secure provider. They have to get pregnant once and it better f***ing work. Right. And what's interesting to me, I've considered that so much and, like, why am I so not that? Well, you only need to do that for a period of time until the baby is safe. 18 years of none of that, I get to be a hoe again? Like, that doesn't make any sense. For the baby to be safe, it may be, like, two years. Oh, I see what you mean. You know, there's the huge group of angry dudes on the internet, Red Pill guys, that say, oh, women are hypergamous. I don't even know if, like, women have souls. Like, men have souls, but, like, women are, women just act like children. And they're just trying to, like, find a provider to use and have a kid with them and then end up f***ing the pool boy, right? There's that huge group of internet trolls, the Red Pillers, if you've heard of them. Yeah. Who are kind of indoctrinated with that.
